title: Advancing to the Next Level: The Science of Video Games (Part 1)
description: How dangerous are video games? Do they provide value beyond entertainment? Neil finds out from video game expert Jeffrey Ryan and Sims designer Will Wright.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
content:encoded: How dangerous are video games? Do they provide value beyond entertainment? Neil finds out from video game expert Jeffrey Ryan and Sims designer Will Wright.
